alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 2:15PM MDT until August 19 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. Standing water is possible along Interstate 15 near Kanarraville. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following counties, Iron and Washington. The Kanarraville vicinity from I-15 through the town itself and including Kanarra Falls and nearby trails. * WHEN...Until 415 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain of potentially up to 2 inches in an hour due to thunderstorms. This may cause urban and small stream flooding. While the storm is weakening currently, flooding hazards will remain for several hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kanarraville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
